neighbors.name: Shirley Delta Maye
neighbors.claims: Shirley Delta Maye is listed as a property owner in Berkeley County’s Falling Waters District, per county tax records ([Berkeley County GIS](https://www.berkeleywv.org/334/Address-SearchGIS-Maps)). No public comments or actions by Maye regarding local development or energy projects could be found in news or meeting records.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach personally via a community liaison to learn her views and any concerns, as her positions are not publicly known.

citations.claim: Shirley Delta Maye is listed as a property owner in Berkeley County’s Falling Waters District
citations.title: Berkeley County Address Search/GIS Maps

neighbors.name: Scott Funkhouser
neighbors.claims: Scott Funkhouser is a resident of Berkeley County and serves as a Lieutenant with the Martinsburg Police Department, where he commands the Bike Patrol Unit ([Herald-Mail Media](https://ipmba.org/resources/product-detail/argos-cement-company-donates-bikes-to-martinsburg-police-department-bike-pa)). He has also served as the President of the Berkeley County Historical Society ([WV Press](https://wvpress.org/copydesk/wv-press-videos/martinsburg-nixes-permit-confederate-flag-event/)). In 2016, in his capacity as Historical Society President, he denied a request by a Confederate heritage group to use the Belle Boyd House property, stating the Society's goal to be inclusive ([WV Press](https://wvpress.org/copydesk/wv-press-videos/martinsburg-nixes-permit-confederate-flag-event/)). He is listed as a donor to the Eastern West Virginia Community Foundation ([EWVCF Annual Report](https://www.ewvcf.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/AnnualReport.pdf)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Police Lieutenant and Historical Society President

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Mr. Funkhouser with respect for his civic roles. Given his leadership in the Historical Society, emphasize how the project respects local heritage and history.

citations.claim: Serves as a Lieutenant with the Martinsburg Police Department
citations.title: Argos Cement Company Donates Bikes to Martinsburg Police Department

citations.claim: Served as President of the Berkeley County Historical Society
citations.title: Martinsburg nixes permit for Confederate flag event

citations.claim: Listed as a donor to the Eastern West Virginia Community Foundation

neighbors.name: Ronald W. Hardy
neighbors.claims: Ronald W. Hardy is a resident of the Martinsburg/Falling Waters area of Berkeley County ([Brown Funeral Homes](https://www.brownfuneralhomeswv.com/memorials/dorothy-cook/3820790)). He is listed as a plaintiff in a civil lawsuit filed in Berkeley County Circuit Court in 2023 ([West Virginia Judiciary](http://www.courtswv.gov/node/34100)). No documented stance on land development or energy projects by Hardy was found in available public sources.

approach_recommendations.engage: A one-on-one outreach respecting his privacy is recommended to gauge his perspective, as he has not openly engaged on development issues.

neighbors.name: Dennis F. Murphy
neighbors.claims: Dennis F. Murphy (Dennis Finbarr Murphy) is a resident of Hedgesville, WV, and has been employed as an armed security guard at a federal training center in the region ([US District Court Filing](https://holdcbpaccountable.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/ds-reply-to-ps-opp-to-ds-mfsj-i.pdf)). He has been a plaintiff in federal litigation regarding employment matters ([Justia](https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/appellate-courts/ca4/19-1742/19-1742-2019-10-21.html)). He has no known public comments on local development or renewable energy projects in the region.
neighbors.influence_justification: Local resident; no civic leadership roles found

approach_recommendations.engage: Since his views are not public, engage Mr. Murphy through personal conversation to identify any concerns or interests.

neighbors.name: Trayer T. Rudy
neighbors.claims: Trayer T. Rudy is a real estate agent with Century 21 Sterling Realty in Berkeley County ([Compass](https://www.compass.com/homedetails/43-Charlotte-Ct-Martinsburg-WV-25405/1UH8W7_pid/)). He also serves as a Construction Coordinator for WVU Medicine Spring Mills ([Imagine Screens](https://imaginescreens.com/our-recent-installs/)). Rudy has served as a Co-Chair for the annual Bernie Hutzler Golf Classic, a local charity event ([WVU Medicine](https://hsc.wvu.edu/hub/announcements/story/?headline=wvu-medicine-hospitals-patients-benefit-from-annual-golf-classic_0)). No specific statements by Rudy regarding renewable energy development were found.
neighbors.influence_justification: Real estate professional and construction coordinator for major health system

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via his professional network in real estate or healthcare construction. His background suggests an understanding of development and land use.

neighbors.name: Todd A. Gladfelter & Karen Gladfelter
neighbors.claims: Todd A. Gladfelter and Karen Gladfelter are residents of Hedgesville, West Virginia ([Kelso-Cornelius Funeral Home](https://www.kelso-corneliusfuneralhome.com/obituaries/Richard-M-Dick-Johnson-Jr?obId=1771219)). They are listed as owners of a residential property on Michelle Dr in Berkeley County ([Veripages](https://veripages.com/name/Todd/Gladfelter/)). Public records identify them as a married couple living in the Hedgesville area ([Kelso-Cornelius Funeral Home](https://www.kelso-corneliusfuneralhome.com/obituaries/Richard-M-Dick-Johnson-Jr?obId=1771219)). No record of either holding local official positions or speaking at county meetings regarding development was found in available archives.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private residents; no public roles found

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via informal, personal outreach to understand any concerns; emphasize respectful communication and community benefits in discussions.

neighbors.claims: Jamie G. Roseman and Dianna L. Roseman jointly own property in the Falling Waters area of Berkeley County ([Berkeley County Assessor](https://www.berkeleywv.org)). No separate business or organizational affiliations were identified in local public records ([Martinsburg Journal](https://www.journal-news.net)). approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through a friendly introduction at their residence; listen to any questions and share clear, factual information about the project.

neighbors.name: Michael D. Writt
neighbors.claims: Michael D. Writt is identified as a property owner in Berkeley County with no accompanying business entity, indicating personal ownership ([Berkeley County Assessor](https://www.berkeleywv.org)). A search of local public records and media did not reveal any notable civic engagement or statements by Writt concerning development or energy projects.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage in a respectful, informative manner at his convenience; provide reassurances about the project’s adherence to community standards and invite him to ask questions.

neighbors.name: FFPLS Hedgesville LLC
neighbors.claims: FFPLS Hedgesville LLC is a limited liability company associated with the property at 1251 Hammonds Mill Road in Hedgesville ([source](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/f/diane-fletcher/)). The entity appears to be a subsidiary of Faithful Forever Pet Loss Services ('FFPLS'), a company specializing in pet cremation and memorial services ([source](https://www.matw.com/investors/sec-filings/all-sec-filings/content/0000063296-21-000005/0000063296-21-000005.pdf)). Public records indicate the LLC has been a defendant in civil litigation in Berkeley County, with case filings dating back to 2022 ([source](https://apps.sos.wv.gov/business/service-of-process/Home/Search?CivilActionNumber=NTR186&page=2)). Previously, the property was the residence of Diane M. Fletcher ([source](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/f/diane-fletcher/)). The company does not appear in West Virginia's domestic business registry, consistent with the structure of a foreign limited liability company ([source](https://apps.sos.wv.gov/business/service-of-process/Home/Search?CivilActionNumber=NTR186&page=2)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Niche commercial service provider or property holding entity; no documented community leadership or broad influence found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via the registered agent or corporate parent (Faithful Forever Pet Loss Services). As a commercial entity, they may be amenable to a financial offer that exceeds the operational or holding value of the asset.

neighbors.profile_summary: FFPLS Hedgesville LLC is likely a subsidiary of Faithful Forever Pet Loss Services, holding property at 1251 Hammonds Mill Road. The entity has been involved in local civil litigation and succeeded individual resident Diane M. Fletcher at the address.

citations.claim: FFPLS Hedgesville LLC is associated with 1251 Hammonds Mill Road and Diane M. Fletcher
citations.title: Diane Fletcher - NPD People Search

overview_summary: Screening of 11 neighboring stakeholders within 0.5 miles identified 10 private residents and one organizational entity, FFPLS Hedgesville LLC. While two stakeholders possess medium influence and nine have low or unknown influence, no high-influence individuals or documented opposition risks were identified. All neighbors currently maintain an unknown stance toward the development, with the organizational neighbor operating as a private land investment entity with no known community role.
